version_description:
- NEW: iCloud Support
- various bug fixes
- fixes a bug that could cause savegame data loss.

Thank you for playing Banana Kong!

Please rate the game after every update to encourage us to create more free updates.

The jungle is ready for your return!

This content update adds many great features:
- All-New Underwater Area!
(Enter through yellow pipes.)
- New Animal Friend: Ride the Turtle!
- Customize your Kong with Hats and Parachutes
- New u

The jungle is ready for your return!
We listened and added some great new features to the game:

- NEW ITEM: Golden Hearts
You can revive Banana Kong and finish your best run!

- 5 FREE Golden Hearts for everyone!

- More Bananas

Bananaaaaaa! The Kong is back with an all-new content update!

Enter the beach-rocket express and warp yourself into a new Banana Kong world.
There's no time for a nap because crabs are luring beneath the sand!

Run faster and dodge them u

This update adds the following languages to the game:
Korean, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Chinese
